The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Fridday 

Cream Mushroom Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (mushroom, leek, potato, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Rice Tagliatelle with Coconut Milk – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g  (rice tagliatelle, coconut milk, zucchini, red bel pepper, red onion, champinion mushrooms, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Corn & Red Bell Pepper Crackers Bread- raw / gluten free / 40 g (corn, red bell pepper, quinoa, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Amoraws Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g  (goji, cashews, coconut flakes, cocoa butter, vanilla, forest berries, psyllium, cowberry, orange, alkaline cocoa, unfiltered honey)
